00001 // Energy Spectrum Histogram Class
00002 // Henric Krawczynski <krawcz@wuphys.wustl.edu>
00003 
00004 //
00005 // Defines Standard Histogram for Determining Energy Spectra
00006 //
00007 
00008 #ifndef ENERGYSPECTRUM_H
00009 #define ENERGYSPECTRUM_H
00010 #include <cmath>
00011 #include "Histogram.h"
00012 #include "Config.h"
00013 
00014 
00019 class EnergySpectrum : public Histogram {
00020 
00021  public:
00022     
00023 
00024     // During chi-square fitting we use a bin only is the sum of 
00025     // on and off counts exceeds the canonical number 5.
00026     static const int MIN_COUNTS = 5;
00027     
00028     // the size of the EnergySpectrum comes from the config file RunInfo
00029     EnergySpectrum(RunInfo& ri,std::string name): 
00030         Histogram(ri.num_e_bins,log10(ri.emin_tev),log10(ri.emax_tev), 
00031                   name) {; }
00032     ~EnergySpectrum() {;}
00033 
00034 }; 
00035 
00036 struct EnergyEstimator {
00037     
00038     EnergyEstimator(){;}
00039     virtual double getEstimate(const double size, const double distance, 
00040                                const double zenith)=0;
00041 
00042 };
00043 
00044 struct LZAEnergyEstimator : EnergyEstimator {    
00045     double getEstimate(const double size, const double distance, 
00046                        const double zenith=1.04719755);
00047 };
00048 
00049 struct SZAEnergyEstimator : EnergyEstimator {    
00050     double getEstimate(const double size, const double distance,
00051                        const double zenith=0.366519);
00052 };
00053 
00054 struct Z40EnergyEstimator : EnergyEstimator {    
00055     double getEstimate(const double size, const double distance,
00056                        const double zenith=0.698131);
00057 };
00058 
00059 struct Z50EnergyEstimator : EnergyEstimator {    
00060     double getEstimate(const double size, const double distance,
00061                        const double zenith=0.872664);
00062 };
